byline.original: By CHARLIE SAVAGE and J. DAVID GOODMAN

snippet: A Virginia resident, Mohamad Anas Haitham Soueid, is accused of collecting information about people protesting in the United States against the Assad government.
lead_paragraph: A Virginia resident, Mohamad Anas Haitham Soueid, is accused of collecting information about people protesting in the United States against the Assad government.

headline.main: Syrian-American Is Arrested on Charges of Spying for Damascus
headline.print_headline: Syrian-American Is Arrested on Charges of Spying for Damascus
headline.seo: Syrian-American Is Accused of Spying for Syrian Government
